name: Lowe's Companies, Inc.
summary: Lowe's Companies, Inc. is a leading American retail company specializing in home improvement, operating a large chain of retail stores across the United States. Founded in 1921 and headquartered in Mooresville, North Carolina, Lowe's is the second-largest hardware chain in the U.S. and serves millions of do-it-yourself and professional customers. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker LOW.
